website_summaries.verdict: These Nike sandals are comfortable enough for all-day wear, provided you get a size that works for you.
pros: Earns praise for being good-looking and comfortable
Complements casual and sporty summer attire
cons: Sizes run slightly small, which could cause the ankle strap to rub if the fit is too tight

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly on my feet, only thing is the straps can’t wrap around my ankles all the way since they’re very small.
customer_reviews.author: Koali Yori

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe and Fits Well!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Can get them wet and not feel soggy. They are great for water parks or adventures that require your feet to be wet but you not feel gross because your shoes will dry fast. Material feels great and the sole is nice and soft but firm.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquih20s

customer_reviews.title: Great vacation shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these while in New York and these are amazing walking shoes. Didn’t get any blisters or irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Adry

customer_reviews.title: their very comfortable. I just think for a sandal they could ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size, their very comfortable. I just think for a sandal they could be priced a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Nitra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are comfortable to walk in.They dont get the bottom of your feet dirty like other sandals.Although I will say they fit maybe a 1/2 size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Biggem94

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. You cant ask for a better summer sandal.
customer_reviews.author: beautiful

customer_reviews.title: New favorite sandal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. The strap seemed thinner then expected. I assumed the sole of the shoe with fit similar to the Nike slides, but they were a bit flimsier?, you could say. I normally wear an 8 1/2 in shoes and I chose the size 9 and they fit perfect. I have slimmer feet and they are pretty fitting on the top straps. They are still good looking sandals. new Favs! Hopefully this helps the next customer out ! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Krisia Grace

customer_reviews.title: You will be delighted!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sandals! Fit is awesome, the heel strap is perfect, the footbed is comfortable. Easy to wipe clean after a day watching my daughter at the softball field! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: rockabillyrhonda

customer_reviews.title: COMFY & CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I got these sandals to use in my home gym and on my elliptical. I injured my big toenail a couple summers ago and it never really recovered. When I'm on a steep incline on my machine my toes push against the toe of my shoe and I end up with sore a toe every time. I haven't yet used these to work out in as I just received them but so far I can say they are very comfortable and will be great to do housework in too and running errands. Got my eye on the white ones next!
customer_reviews.author: Winston Noel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes a lot. I wear an 8.5 in Nike sneakers and usually a 9 in most shoes so I sized up to 9 and I wish I got an 8 instead. I’m keeping them regardless but they’re just a little bit big. So definitely size down. They are SUPER lightweight and they feel great on. I have very skinny feet and they aren’t tight to my feet like I think they’re supposed to be, but I also got a size too big. So just a warning. I recommend these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable just try not to get them wet with too much exposure to the sun... product will fade. I've purchased two, but very comfortable stylish shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn V

customer_reviews.title: going to order 7 instead of 8
customer_reviews.text: im usually a 7 1/2 most 8's usually fit me. i decided to go with 8 because other people said that nike runs small but they actually are a bit bigger than i thought. will be ordering 7 to compare . my pair also came a bit dirty. i also thinkg for the quality the price point is extremely high.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I do like these shoes, my work wont allow me to wear slides. I had to have a back steak glad nike sells them like this. Bery comfortable as well. I have Plantar fasciitis and it's been challenging to find the right shoes. These and nike slides actually work very well and have plenty of style.
customer_reviews.author: carla hall bainter

customer_reviews.title: Five stars if they offered half sizes
customer_reviews.text: My daughters each had a pair and didn't want me to wear theirs. I bought my own but a smaller size. I'm a half size normally but without socks the smaller size still works. Super light and comfortable. Slightly narrower than normal shoes of similar style but not bad. Overall the light weight with good support make these great sandals for getting around.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Said

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: Good sandals. I got them for my 14 year old daughter in size 5 and they fit perfect I also have them in black for myself and they are really comfortable that’s what made me get them for my daughter she has autism and comfort is very Necessary as well as the ease of being able to put them on by herself is definitely a plus! I’m satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Covered girl

customer_reviews.title: Too big and too small at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I returned my shoes. I wear a size 10 narrow. The ban around my feet was a little tight and the toe area was long. It looked weird. The box was damaged when I received them and the refund is taking forever
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Break them in before a long use in them!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 8, but bought a 9 due to the reviews I’ve read it runs small which was great advice! Fits great, although if you are wide footed, break it in before using for a long day in them. I have wide feet, it’s a bit snug on the Nike labeled strap. The Velcro could and should be longer extended as well. Definitely break these in before a long use. I got quite a few compliments and looks from wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole jacildo

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok so for now my feet is a bit swollen due to my pregnancy, it was a bit tight but I know once the swelling goes away I will fit it with no problem. I love my Nike sandal. I have flip flops but I wanted sandals that can be secured and I won’t worry about it coming off my feet. Super cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: AJrobo207

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Sandler’s are of good quality however I assumed the straps would stretch but they don’t so for people with wide feet it’s not a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I could not decide between these sandals and a Sketcher sandal. However I am really glad I ordered the Nike one. I ordered a size 7 although I am an 8 in their shoes. I tend to have narrow feet and slip out the front of most sandals but not these. I want to order another pair since they are so versatile and comfortable. They are easy to wash to if you take them to the beach. They are no slippery, I can wear them anywhere and chase my kid all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m normally a size 6 1/2 but due to reviews I orders 1/2 size up so ended with a 7. They fit good length wise but are a little narrow fine for my feet just a little snug not uncomfortably though. If you have a wider foot I recommend really considering it. But other than that I love them they’re comfy. Feels like I’m walking on clouds
customer_reviews.author: Samantha garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! Usually I get blisters on the bottom of my feel from sliding around, but these sandals have the perfect ridges to keep your feet from slipping, and the bottoms are made like tennis shoes for awesome support and comfort. I recommend these to anyone looking for a good sandal! I wear a size 10 (sometimes 11) and these in a size 10 fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Baylee Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! I like the fact that they stay on your feet when you're active!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY friends all got pairs after seeing mine
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO COMFORTABLE and all my friends were jealous and had to buy their own
customer_reviews.author: Brelyn

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and comfy. Watch sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these, but I did have to go down a full size from my normal Nike size. They’re sandals, so you can conceal a poor fit. They’re really comfortable and lightweight. Look amazing with bike shorts, too! Perfect for a very casual summer!
customer_reviews.author: HJY

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight! No half sizes :(
customer_reviews.text: I wear women's size 6 in all my shoes and these where WAY too tight! I don't have super wide feet never owned a wide size, but the straps are sooo very tight I couldn't even get them on. Tried a size 7 instead and they where too big the straps fit better but the shoe itself was much to big. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss I guess
customer_reviews.text: Go up a size. Cute shoes. The box mine came in was cut with a box opener or something so I was very worried my shoes got cut too but they seem fine. They did have some white fuzz and crumbs all over them that won't come off. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: One shoe was way bigger than the other and I’m just not talking about your typical little bit bigger the right she was bigger than the other and it curved outward towards the left the left one fit me just fine. I return this got the same shoes now this time both of them boaded out.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I’m walking on sponge!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new babies. They fit perfectly! Well worthy the money. I’ve been wanting these slide for over a year now and finally I’ve got them. I am in love. Shipping was fast, and the Packaging was well done. The material of the slide is very comfy and soft. Feels like I’m walking on sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Oliveen M.

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they look good. My only complaint is I'm usually a size 7 1/2 and these sandals dont offer half sizes so they are a tiny bit big. But better a shoe with room than one that's too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too small, did not fit right, and offer little to no support for your feet. The material of the shoes was not what I expected. The shoes do not accommodate wide feet. I don’t recommend and if you do buy make sure you don’t exceed your return date.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the the look of them but once I received them I did not like the material! For the price that I was paying it looked super cheap. I was very disappointed in Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly to size. Very comfortable to wear and do long walks. I use these a ton in the summer, and they are very stylish and on trend. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: True to size for me
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable they feel. I saw a lot of people say to size down and I did and I think the shoe was a little small for my liking but if I would’ve gotten my size I think I would’ve been more comfortable. Either way I’ll still wear them because they’re so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I Love them wish they came in wide because my feet are fat had to break them in a couple times before they became comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Casey Renee

customer_reviews.title: Read my description
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals BUT they have ridges on the insole. I have fairly sensitive feet and every step I take I can feel the ridges rubbing on my feet and it’s just not pleasant. But if your feet are well worn, these would be great
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Goss

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandal. For the money, I was surprised they were such a lightweight foam material. So kind of slimsy, scuffs easily... Comfy and lightweight...but they honestly feel like a $5 sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Could be worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Kinda a narrow shoe so if you have skinny narrow feet you might like them. But if you have fat feet like me not so much. However they are really comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe! It does squeak a little when you walk, but you can get pass that.
customer_reviews.author: Shavon

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY CONTENT.
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to give these to my wife! I will update how they fit and feel! I am actually really liking them and I want a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jake moua

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these even tho I hate my toes lol I needed something to wear after work being in plant boot hurts my feet and these are so comfy
customer_reviews.author: shaleeka Jay

customer_reviews.title: Aweful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Nike tanjun sandals or so I thought I did. It came in the mail today and it wasn’t the Nike tanjun sandals it was a random pair of Nike slides that was not in the picture and I wouldn’t have ordered had I known they were slides cause the ones I wanted to order had straps. So I’ll be returning these & I wouldn’t reccomend buying from here because it is false advertisement the picture is not what came in the mail at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kate lynch

customer_reviews.title: Not a wide width but still very comfy and supportive for this heavy woman.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very comfy sandals. A little tighter on the strap closest to ankle. Should have ordered a size up but the 10 is what I wear so true to size there. But, definitely not a wide width shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jackie rains

customer_reviews.title: Really love it
customer_reviews.text: Kinda farts when you walk if you have sweat or water. Wish it didnt
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit
customer_reviews.text: Prefect fit, i was a bit scare it might be too big. Glad the i bought my regular size. Love how comfortable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkypink94

customer_reviews.title: N for NOPE
customer_reviews.text: It seems tight and there is still alot of room in the toe and I cannot move my foot up. Also mine had a stain on the N of NIKE
customer_reviews.author: littleHONEYvee

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, a little tough when you first wear them but once broken in they are great! Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Go Down A Half Size!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable but a little wide in design, I would recommend getting a half size smaller (which wasn't an option when I ordered) so I went with my regular size and since my feet are more narrow than wide, they make my feet look a little big but I'll get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: QA

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, but I bought my normal size and it fits but barely and the straps are so tight in leaves marks all over my feet
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I wore them all day long walking around @ Universal Studios without any discomfort. I’m glad I purchased such a cute & comfortable sandal.
customer_reviews.author: LaWanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried mainly that I may blister at the ankle, but I didn’t. They are comfortable, foot did not slide, they are comfortable for moderate walking
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! I went up a half size and soooo glad I did they fit and feel amazing. I suspect I’ll be doing a lot of walking on campus. The strap support and design is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Loverslie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Size up
customer_reviews.text: Size up if you are a half size!! I’m a 7.5 and I got an 8 and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Maisha Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: They are too good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my very picky daughter because I could not stand watching her stand on the cold side walk. They were a direct hit that’s the good news the bad news for me is my other shoe snob daughter also wants a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Fit to advertising size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fix as described. I love them! No complaints at this time. Only had them for a few days
customer_reviews.author: Margaret  Diane Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My feet have been swelling as well as knee pain so I was looking for a cute sandal with a sneaker feel. So comfortable. I wear an 8/12 -91/2. I ordered a 9. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shamar

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She's 18 and they can be worn with jeans or shorts
customer_reviews.author: mandi towle

customer_reviews.title: These fit oddly
customer_reviews.text: They would have been great shoes if it wasn't for the odd shape at the toes. I expected these to fit like Chacos would, however the tip of the shoe is more pointy than I would like. It may just be the shape of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for we or dry conditions!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the granddaughter and she loves them. She wears them almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelann

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfy. If your feet swell (I’m a hairdresser) like mine then it’s a tight fit but overall really happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Style was exactly what I expected but the straps across the top are not adjustable so it's a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love the strap can go anywhere with them!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them all day long for San Patty day in San Antonio river walk and my feet didn’t hurt at all no blisters no aches. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cermeno

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I don’t normally buy shoes online due to not knowing how they fit/comfort level but these were so cute I had to try! They are very comfy and the only shoes I have worn since I got them! Good arch support and straps don’t hurt when I walk!
customer_reviews.author: WENDI T.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: They fit small. The strap doeant provide much adjusting so that the shoe would fit so I had to return them. I really wanted these shoes to work out
customer_reviews.author: Urobsession

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: When I receive my sandals one fit different than the other i had several others try the shoes on the see if it was just me but the right sandal was shaped different than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Pointed a little bit inwards on toes, but still good!
customer_reviews.text: They’re super light and comfortable footwear. I’m usually a size 5 but upon reading reviews I read that they run small. I decided to order a size up, and went with a size 6. They fit perfect! Super cute too. Knocking a star off just because they do seem a little pointed inwards on the tips where toes go. Still look good though, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe and Fits Well!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Can get them wet and not feel soggy. They are great for water parks or adventures that require your feet to be wet but you not feel gross because your shoes will dry fast. Material feels great and the sole is nice and soft but firm.Didn’t get any blisters or irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and they wear well. Love these so much.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all day every day. They’re super comfortable breathable and look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE TO SIZE !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 in women’s and the sandals fit like a narrow 8, way to tight super uncomfortable. Sad to have to return them cause they are cute
customer_reviews.author: David & Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! The fit so comfortably! The only two things I’d change is going down one size and they tend to have a foot smell after only wearing them a few times and I don’t have stinky feet lol
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I liked at the time i bought them the price was the cheapest i could find these
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Cute style but no stretch or give
customer_reviews.text: Order up a side if your foot isn’t narrow may have to up two sizes or just judge your foot to shoe ratio
customer_reviews.author: Diva A

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! Super comfortable! True to size. Getting another pair but different color. Definitely get them if you want comfortable stylish sandals. 👍🏽🤘🏽
customer_reviews.author: Rosa3374

customer_reviews.title: Runs half a size small.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. Order a size larger cause it does run small.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I DISLIKED NOTHING ABOUT THEM. A GREAT PAIR OF SANDALS.
customer_reviews.author: dahlia

customer_reviews.title: half size too small
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable sandals I’ve worn and they’re super cute, but they’re run half a size too small. I got a size 8 and my foot was sitting right on top of the end of the shoe so that part wasn’t pleasant. I recommend going up a size if you plan to buy them. I tried on a size 9 and they fit more comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Besides these shoes being super cute they are super Comfortable. Would order another color in the future for sure
customer_reviews.author: Esme

customer_reviews.title: Never a again
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came with strap broken. I tried to reach out for a refund several times but they were not trying to help me .
customer_reviews.author: Laquisha H.

customer_reviews.title: Nike sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes very popular w/my age group of older teens!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Surmont

customer_reviews.title: Show Size
customer_reviews.text: Only downside was that they don’t have half sizes. My sister wears a 7.5, so I ordered her a 7. I was nervous about the size, but they fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Vickery

customer_reviews.title: I'm so in LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Order a 1⁄2 size up, I have narrow feet and they are perfect, my original shoe size is 8.5 wmn and 7y kids, so I ordered a size 9
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful & Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom and she absolutely loves them
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Every day wear
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable these are. Good for walking and great to drive on. They run a little bit big but I I like them.
customer_reviews.author: DANA WALLACE

customer_reviews.title: Not for Half size
customer_reviews.text: Much too wide. No way to adjust width back strap not adjustable enough I’m a 81/2 so 8 too small 8 way too big. Great for a wide width but not for half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy krasowski

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE be sure to go up a size ! They fit small other than that they’re PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality seller and product
customer_reviews.text: I got them as a gift for my cousin. I haven't been able tho give them to her yet so I'm not sure how they'll fit, but they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i where a 9.5 but i got a 9 by mistake. my toe and heel line up to the ends of the sandal. i suggest sizing up to the next full size if you want you feet to look tiny in them & need room to grow
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lu

customer_reviews.title: true fit and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The price is crazy for this, however super comfy and looks great with jeans or leggins
customer_reviews.author: MiMiBee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and it's pretty comfortable. I wore them during my 9 hour shift with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Extremely comfortable, they offer more support than you’d expect. I really struggle with planter falsities and I can walk in these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect my second pair . Great gift idea and they’re true to size
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: very light weight and cool style.
customer_reviews.text: very light weight and cool style...looks just like pictures. i bought my normal shoe size and it fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My foot didn’t even go In at all and I wear a 9 in woman in every pair of shoe sandal boot sneaker I wear
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Spicy
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much! Stylish supportive cute and inexpensive!!!!!! I love them fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 🤔💰
customer_reviews.text: Sandals are nice, I like them and would recommend. Price I don’t get🤷🏽‍♀️. I guess it’s the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne Taylor

customer_reviews.text: I am weary of ordering shoes online, so I sized up. I’m usually a 5.5 in women’s but ordered a 6. Boy did they fit perfectly. Very comfortable. Bouncy sole. The strap in the back isn’t scratchy. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe it self was comfortable however I dislike how it looked on my foot I got a 9 it fit perfect but made my foot look bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute !
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute I was gonna buy them for my grandma for Mother’s Day but I like them so much I decided to keep them and just get her something else lol . But super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Selena Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandal great for walking and is stylish . Will be ordering more !
customer_reviews.author: bryona

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL
customer_reviews.text: They look like Nike’s but are fake looking! I got a size 8 Way to small, the box was smashed awful never buy again from saler EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Tanjun Sandal Womens
product_meta.description: Comfort for warmer weather is yours with the Nike Tanjun Sandal.
feature_bullets: Lightweight Tanjun running shoe traction outsole
Slingback Velcro ankle strap with hook and loop closure
